title: What's name of this script typeface?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007003222im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/script_6644.jpg)
  
It looks like a House Industries font, but I’m not quite sure. Does anyone recognize this?
 [‹ Anybody know this font?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007003222/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41862 "Go to previous forum topic") [Finding typefaces by date of release ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007003222/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41803 "Go to next forum topic")
author: pfutz

comments.content:
That is hand lettered. Look at the two p’s, they are not identical.

It is similar to Ed Script tho.

[http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=150&subpage=viewfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007003222/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=150&subpage=viewfonts "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=150&subpage=viewfonts")
